scripts.update: git fetch origin master && git pull origin master && rm -rf build/ && yarn && tsc
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator -u iwa -p Kwako --exclude-labels "duplicate","question","invalid","wontfix","Duplicate","Question","Invalid","Wontfix","Meta: Exclude From Changelog","update","question-discussion","dependencies" --add-sections '{"features":{"prefix":"**New features:**","labels":["feature", "features"]}}' --no-compare-link
scripts.lavadockerarm: docker run --name lavalink -p 8070:8070 -v "$PWD/lavalink/application.yml:/opt/Lavalink/application.yml" --restart unless-stopped --platform linux/amd64 -d fredboat/lavalink:master-v3
